divs: Sighting DetailsWas at home with my kid and went outside onto the back porch and noticed a very odd out of place object in the sky above the mountains that face the direction of the ocean. The object was still and did not move for about 5 minutes and then suddenly it was gone!
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in San Luis Obispo
There were no other sightings in San Luis Obispo on or around January 2nd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: At home with my kid,walked outside to look at the mountains and there it was
